turns.user: The graph shows two lines labeled A and B. Line A passes through the point (3, 7) and Line B passes through the point (3, 10). Line A appears to follow the equation y = 2x + 3, while Line B follows the equation y = 3x + 1. Which line has a steeper slope?

"On a piece of machinery, the centers of two pulleys are 3 feet apart, and the radius of each pulley is 6 inches. How long a belt (in feet) is needed to wrap around both pulleys? Leave your answer in terms of \\(\\pi\\)."

            "(6 + 0.5\\pi) \\ ft",
            "(6 + 0.25\\pi) \\ ft",
            "(6 + 12\\pi) \\ ft",
            "(6 + \\pi) \\ ft"

A chess king is said to attack all the squares one step away from it, horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.
